settings.title: What services do you offer?
settings.text: We offer a range of services that varies from AI integrations to Digital Marketing, including AI Dev, SEO, SMM, Email Marketing, Web Design & other Business Solutions.

settings.title: Do you offer any strategy pack?
settings.text:
Of course! We do offer several packages tailored to different needs, divided in Standard,
Advanced, and Pro plans.

settings.title: How much do your services cost?
settings.text: Our pricing varies depending on the services you need. We offer customizable packages to fit different situations, budgets and goals.

settings.title: Is the LFA Growth Strategy included in any Pack?
settings.text: The LFA Growth Strategy is recommended with any pack but not included. It is surely and addition that works as a key to open the inner potential of packs.

settings.title: How useful can AI be for my Business?
settings.text: Process Automation, Customer Service, Data Analysis & Insights, Content Creation, SEO, Web Design, Email Marketing... just to name a few. The opportunities are endless and LFA are dedicate to ensuring the most relevant and effective of the strategies that can be leveraged with AI.

settings.title: What is the most recommended plan?
settings.text: We always recommend to have a free consultation with one of our specialists regarding what best suits. If the starting point is little to no online presence then Standard is what to go for.

settings.title: Do you offer training about AI automation integrated?
settings.text: Yes, we offer separate private sessions, group training sessions, and refined presentations to help you and your team understand strategies and tools.

settings.title: How do you develop the LFA Growth strategy?
settings.text: We start by understanding your goals, target audience, and current marketing efforts. Then, we create a customised strategy that includes various digital marketing tactics to achieve your aimed results.

settings.title: How long does it take to see results?
settings.text: The timeline for seeing results can vary depending on the service. SEO typically takes a few months, while PPC and social media campaigns can show results more quickly. The human factor remains a key component, the bigger the effort the bigger the result.

settings.title: How do you measure the success of a strategy?
settings.text: We use various metrics such as website traffic, conversion rates, and ROI to measure the success of our campaigns. Gathering data helps achieve more accurate measurements and successful future outcomes. Depending on the Growth Plan decided, we provide regular reports to keep you informed.
